## ğŸµ create music

```{r}
library(gm)

m <-
# initialize a Music object
Music() +
# add a 4/4 time signature
Meter(4, 4) +
# add a musical line of four quarter notes
Line(list("C5", "D5", "E5", "F5"), list(1, 1, 1, 1))
show(m, to = c("score", "audio"))
```
